entities.description: The use of mental health services by both adults and youth.
The use of illegally made fentanyl, including lifetime use and most recent use.
The most recent use of illegally made fentanyl with a needle.
The use of vaping any substance, including lifetime and most recent use.
The misuse of prescription drugs over the past 12 months.
The type of survey administered, e.g., by ACASI.
The accuracy of the survey, affected by self-reporting and recall.
The specific annual time frame the survey covers.

relationships.description: Details the use of mental health services for adults and youth.
Measures the lifetime and recent use of illegally made fentanyl.
Measures the most recent use of illegally made fentanyl with a needle.
Excludes questions related to the recent use of vaping substances.
Captures information on prescription drug misuse over the last 12 months.
Specifies the mode of administration for the survey (e.g., using ACASI).
The accuracy of the survey results influenced by self-reporting and recall.
Specifies the annual period the survey covers.
